import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Home: React.FC = () => { return (

Welcome to Blood Donation Awareness

Learn about blood types, compatibility, and the importance of blood donation

Check Blood Compatibility View Regional Data

Why Donate Blood?

Blood donation is a critical way to save lives. A single donation can help multiple patients in need. Blood cannot be manufactured and can only come from generous donors.

Blood Types Matter

Understanding blood types is crucial for safe transfusions. Different blood types have different compatibilities, and knowing your blood type can help you understand who you can donate to and receive from.

Learn More About Blood Compatibility

Blood Type Distribution

Blood type distribution varies by region and ethnicity. Understanding the distribution in your area can help you appreciate the importance of diverse blood donors.

View Blood Type Distribution

Your Donation Makes a Difference

1 Donation

Can save up to 3 lives

Every 2 Seconds

Someone needs blood

38%

Of the population is eligible to donate

Blood donation is a simple process that takes about an hour of your time but can make a significant impact on someone's life.

); }; export default Home;
